properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat. The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms. This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

Charming two bedroom bungalow in a quiet residential area. Features include a spacious living room with bay window, modern fitted kitchen, two double bedrooms, and a well-maintained rear garden perfect for outdoor entertaining. The property benefits from off-street parking, gas central heating, and double glazing throughout. Located within easy reach of local amenities and transport links.

Stunning four bedroom detached family home offering spacious accommodation throughout. The ground floor comprises entrance hall, large lounge with feature fireplace, separate dining room, modern kitchen/breakfast room, and utility room. First floor features four generous bedrooms with master en-suite and family bathroom. Additional benefits include a double garage, driveway parking, and landscaped rear garden.

Modern one bedroom apartment in a sought-after development. Features open-plan living area with fitted kitchen, spacious bedroom with built-in wardrobes, and contemporary bathroom suite. The property includes allocated parking space and benefits from being close to shopping facilities and train station. Ideal for first-time buyers or investors.

Exceptional five bedroom executive home in prestigious location. This impressive property features entrance hallway, study, drawing room, family room, dining room, and luxury fitted kitchen with island. First floor offers five bedrooms including master suite with dressing room and en-suite. Second floor provides additional accommodation. Mature gardens, triple garage, and gated entrance complete this outstanding home.

Superb three bedroom penthouse apartment with spectacular views. This top floor property boasts a spacious reception room with access to private terrace, modern integrated kitchen, three double bedrooms with master en-suite, and luxury family bathroom. Features include wooden flooring, video entry system, and underground parking. Located in the heart of the town center with excellent transport connections.
